challengeName: Hercules PCDVR iOS App - MyStories Theme selector
detailedRequirements:
*Source Code*
All source code is in a private forum.  If you don’t have access, you’ll need to request access in the forum for this F2F.

More details on this project can be found here:

http://apps.topcoder.com/wiki/display/~ghostar/Hercules+Personal+Content+DVR+Apps

*My Stories*
Note that the “MyStories” branch of PCDVR is a separate project right now.  You should use the Magisto_PoC package in the PCDVR iOS Codebase thread in the private forum, not the regular PCDVR iOS codebase.  The functionality is only seen on iPad, under the “MyStories” option in the footer.

*ISSUE:*

The initial MyStories proof of concept didn't use the themes from Magisto because the API details were not know.  Magisto has since provided theme details we can use when defining the story:

To get the list of themes you use 

URL: /v1/musiclib/themes
Method: GET

response will be a json dictionary with the following structure {  'themes' : [list of themes] } 

where list of themes is list of dictionaries with: id, name, info_txt, large_thumb and some other fields (which i dont think you will need)
    example theme: 

{
info_txt: "Show support for your favorite teams with this World Cup-inspired editing style!",
engine_style: "fashion",
name: "World Cup",
type_mask: 1,
large_thumb: "http://d1oca24q5dwo6d.cloudfront.net/theme/world_cup/63/lthumb.jpg",
video: "http://www.magisto.com/api/musiclib/theme/video/63",
info_back: "http://d1oca24q5dwo6d.cloudfront.net/theme/world_cup/63/info.jpg",
id: 63
},


you can select a theme with the following api call: 

URL: /v1/video/upload/meta
Method: POST
API specific param: theme_id

 

This F2F will remove the mock list on the "Select A Theme" page and will replace it with the list of actual themes.  A loading spinner can be shown while the network operation to pull the themes is in progress.  The selected theme should be applied to the story when it is sent to the server.  Don't use any synchronous network calls.
